name: Little Warlings
description:
Little Warlings

... is a small medieval strategy game where you and your army fight against the enemy. You, the player, get to buy and place special units at strategic positions in order to be victorious. Play the rather difficult 'Skirmish' mode or play a gradually more challenging adventure in the 'Campaign' mode. 

Follow me on Twitter: @MarcusKaraker
Special thanks to @Noggin_bops
Main theme by @splatter_data__

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

  • Up arrow: speed up the game.
  • Down arrow: slow down the game.
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6: shortcuts to select which unit to spawn.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
